Reviews.Title: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005GCT08U/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title
Reviews.Author: Francisco Andrade
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent, but i received a very poor response from the company that sold the cel. It was missing a holster for the cel i bought and never get the replacement eventhough i was told by the company that I was going to receive one. the company is Orderinstant. Until this company will not work under "the umbrella of Amazon" I will not be ordering any item form this company.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: E. Latini
Reviews.Content: Now it is out the new BB family but this is still the best if you do not want to spend more and you are not interested in all the coolness of android devices etc...

Reviews.Title: Anyone knows whether the unlocked version could support China Mobile?
Reviews.Author: Chyi
Reviews.Content: Anyone knows whether the unlocked version could support China Unicom? Thanks anyone who could help me!I will pay for it and bring it to China, so i just want to know if it could suppor the band~

Reviews.Title: In that work the team bands
Reviews.Author: Maryoly
Reviews.Content: Hi, I need this model, with bands 1,2,5,6 or gsm operator AT & T, Rogers.I await your timely response.

Reviews.Title: doubt about the bands
Reviews.Author: Alejandro (Venezuela)
Reviews.Content: Good ... I am interested in buying the product but would like to know which team is working bands to see if an official in my country with my carrier of choice ... Also find out if they are T-Mobile? I am very interested in the team so I would appreciate your prompt response

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: nancy margarita andrade
Reviews.Content: I am interested in buying the product but i need to know the 3G bands.I appreciate your prompt response, thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
2.8-inch LCD display
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like ATandT and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported; Camera Primary 5 MP, 2592x1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, dual-band, Wi-Fi hotspot
8GB storage, 768 MB RAM
Features Geo-tagging, face detection, image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry BB 9900 Bold Touch Unlocked Phone with Touch Screen, QWERTY Keyboard, 5MP Camera and Blackberry OS 7
